description: This boy didn´t have an easy life. As a butcher he struggled to get a well-paid job after school so eventually he gave up on the trade and got into metalworking. He fluctuated a lot before he finally found a stable job he would enjoy. He was happy until a very serious car accident changed everything. He spent six months in bed recovering while his loving girlfriend took care of him. The misfortune brought them together and they decided to marry. But there was no happy ending. Arguments with his parents drove the young couple away from their home town. The boy started looking for a job in Prague. His plan was to bring his family to the capital. They wanted a fresh start. And now this loyal and devoted husband was sitting in front of me looking for help. And I was getting a huge boner...
title: Dirty Scout 148
